name: Snake Exploration
description:
Snake Exploration is local multiplayer where 1st player and 2nd player take many museum object as much as possible before time is out. 

If two player can pass minimal point for next level, they will go next level!

Use strategy to collect all points!

Watch out for wall which can change to broken wall!

Part of Museum Game Jam A Maze 2021 

Credits to:

Deutsches Museum, Munich

German Maritime Museum – Leibniz Institute for Maritime History, Bremerhaven

Germanisches Nationalmuseum – Leibniz Research Museum of Cultural History, Nuremberg

Surabaya Inferno and Dato of Srivijaya for music
